An achievable task, ambition, etc. is one that is possible to achieve: Before you set your targets, make sure that they are achievable. Synonyms
doable
realizable

able to be achieved, especially after a lot of effort: an achievable goal/outcome/target The efficiency targets are demanding but achievable.
